summary: An ordinance relating to the preparation of plans, specifications and estimates for safety lighting improvements as contemplated by Ordinance No. 76592, increasing the appropriation therefor from the Seattle General Street Lighting Bonds, 1948 Fund, from Fifty Thousand Dollars ($50,000) to Seventy Thousand Dollars ($70,000) and amending Section 1 of Ordinance No. 77164 as amended.
